headerText: The `v-icon` component provides a large set of glyphs to provide context to various aspects of your application. Vuetify icons utilize Google's Material Icons font library. For a list of all available icons, visit the official [Material Icons](https://material.io/icons/) page.

usage.desc: Icons come in two themes (light and dark), and four different sizes (standard, medium, large, and x-large). If you want to use SVG icons with `VIcon` component, read about using SVG icons with `VIcon` [here](/framework/icons#component-icons).

fontAwesome.desc: [Font Awesome](http://fontawesome.io/icons/) is also supported. Simply use the `fa-` prefixed icon name. Please note that you still need to include the Font Awesome icons in your project.

mdi.desc: [Material Design Icons](https://materialdesignicons.com/) is also supported. Simply use the `mdi-` prefixed icon name. Please note that you still need to include the MDI icons in your project.

color.desc: Using color helpers you can change the color of an icon from the standard dark and light themes.

buttons.desc: Icons can be used inside of buttons to add emphasis to the action.

clickable.desc: Binding any click event to `v-icon` will automatically change the cursor to a pointer.

props.left: Places the icon on the left, when used inside a button
props.right: Places the icon on the right, when used inside a button
